text.text_translated: For ten years, people were very unhappy with many big supermarkets. They threw away many tonnes of food. They underpaid their suppliers. They put too much plastic in their packaging. This plastic hurt our environment. But now, supermarkets and grocers are starting to notice. Many shoppers were very angry about the plastic. They told the supermarkets to change. So, some big UK supermarkets made a promise together. They will change packaging a lot. They will not use too much plastic.
